commands.statement:
SELECT DF.DocumentNo , DF.FormID , DF.Title , DF.CreatorName , DF.NextWorkSchedule , DF.Tags , DF.CreatedAt FROM DocumentForm DF WHERE DF.DocumentNo = @DocumentNo AND DF.FormID = @FormID;
SELECT DD.DetailNo , DD.DocumentNo , DD.DateName , DD.ExecutionWorkName , DD.Objective , DD.KeyResult FROM DocumentForm DF INNER JOIN DocumentDetail DD ON DF.DocumentNo = DD.DocumentNo WHERE DD.DocumentNo = @DocumentNo AND DF.FormID = @FormID AND DD.DetailCategory = 'DetailItems1';

statement.if: INSERT INTO DocumentDetail ( DocumentNo , Objective , DateName , KeyResult , DetailCategory , CreatedAt ) VALUES ( @DocumentNo , @Objective , @DateName , @KeyResult , 'DetailItems1' , DATETIME('NOW', 'localtime') );

UPDATE DocumentDetail SET Objective = @Objective , DateName = @DateName , KeyResult = @KeyResult , ModifiedAt = DATETIME('NOW', 'localtime') WHERE DetailNo = @DetailNo AND DocumentNo = @DocumentNo AND DetailCategory = 'DetailItems1';
DELETE FROM DocumentDetail WHERE DetailNo = @DetailNo AND DocumentNo = @DocumentNo AND DetailCategory = 'DetailItems1';
